Source.Name: zellij
Source.Summary: A terminal workspace with batteries included
Source.Description: Zellij is a terminal workspace. It has the base functionality of a terminal multiplexer (similar to tmux or screen) but includes many built-in features that would allow users to extend it and create their own personalized environment.
